command.name: CHANOP
command.syntax: /ChanServ CHANOP <#channel> ADD <nick> <level> /ChanServ CHANOP <#channel> DEL <nick> /ChanServ CHANOP <#channel> LIST
command.desc: The CHANOP command can be used to maintain channel operator lists. The ADD subcommand is used to add channel operators, the DEL subcommand is used to remove operators, and the LIST subcommand is used to show the list of channel operators.

ex.pre: To grant Carlton level 3 op status on #sorcery
To remove Bah from #sorcery's op list
